verses.verse: <S%H7971>Cast<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H6440>on<s%> the <S%H4325>waters;<s%> for you shall <S%H4672>find<s%> it after <S%H7230>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
<S%H5414>Give<s%> a <S%H2506>portion<s%> to <S%H7651>seven,<s%> <S%H8083>yes,<s%> even to eight; for you <S%H3045>don't<s%> know what <S%H7451>evil<s%> will be on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

If the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1653>rain,<s%> they <S%H7324>empty<s%> themselves on the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and if a <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> toward the <S%H1864>south,<s%> or toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H5307>falls,<s%> there shall it <S%H1933>be.<s%>
He who <S%H8104>observes<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H2232>won't<s%> sow; and he who <S%H7200>regards<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> <S%H7114>won't<s%> reap.

As you <S%H3045>don't<s%> know what is the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> nor how the <S%H6106>bones<s%> grow in the <S%H990>womb<s%> of her who is with <S%H4392>child;<s%> even so you <S%H3045>don't<s%> know the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> who does <S%H6213>all.<s%>

In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and in the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H3240>don't<s%> withhold your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> for you <S%H3045>don't<s%> know <S%H335>which<s%> will <S%H3787>prosper,<s%> whether this or <S%H8147>that,<s%> or whether they both will be <S%H259>equally<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%>
Truly the <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H4966>sweet,<s%> and a <S%H2896>pleasant<s%> thing it is for the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

<S%H120>Yes,<s%> if a man <S%H2421>lives<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> let him <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in them <S%H2142>all;<s%> but let him remember the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> for they shall be <S%H7235>many.<s%> All that <S%H935>comes<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>

<S%H8055>Rejoice,<s%> young <S%H970>man,<s%> in your <S%H3208>youth,<s%> and let your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2895>cheer<s%> you in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H979>youth,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and in the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of your <S%H4758>eyes;<s%> but <S%H3045>know<s%> that for all these things <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H3708>sorrow<s%> from your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and put <S%H5674>away<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> from your <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> for <S%H7839>youth<s%> and the <S%H7839>dawn<s%> of life are <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>
